member.name: T:NSwag.AspNetCore.OpenApiDocumentMiddlewareSettings
member.summary: The Swagger middleware settings.

member.name: P:NSwag.AspNetCore.OpenApiDocumentMiddlewareSettings.DocumentName
member.summary: Gets the document name (internal identifier, default: v1).

member.name: P:NSwag.AspNetCore.OpenApiDocumentMiddlewareSettings.Path
member.summary: Gets or sets the path to serve the OpenAPI/Swagger document (default: '/swagger/{documentName}/swagger.json').
member.remarks: May contain '{documentName}' placeholder to register multiple routes.

member.name: P:NSwag.AspNetCore.OpenApiDocumentMiddlewareSettings.ExceptionCacheTime
member.summary: Gets or sets for how long a caught during schema generation is cached.

member.name: P:NSwag.AspNetCore.OpenApiDocumentMiddlewareSettings.PostProcess
member.summary: Gets or sets the Swagger post process action. Should only be used to transform the document related to the request. Caution: This action will not be called by the CLI or NSwagStudio (use PostProcess in AddSwaggerDocument instead).

member.name: P:NSwag.AspNetCore.OpenApiDocumentMiddlewareSettings.CreateDocumentCacheKey
member.summary: Should be used in a case when your application is exposed under different URLs, e.g. the application is accessible from your internal network and behind a reverse-proxy. In this case, NSwag has to generate a separate JSON document for every access point. As for the callback, the application has to tell NSwag which swagger JSON document it should return by providing a unique key that matches the required access point (either it's an internal network HTTP request or an HTTP request from a reverse-proxy). Hint: In a case of reverse proxy, the key may include of X-Forwarded-Host/X-Forwarded-Proto header values.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: P:NSwag.AspNetCore.SwaggerSettings.MiddlewareBasePath
member.summary: Gets or sets the OWIN base path (when mapped via app.MapOwinPath()) (must start with '/').

member.name: P:NSwag.AspNetCore.SwaggerSettings.DocumentPath
member.summary: Gets or sets the Swagger document route (must start with '/', default: '/swagger/{documentName}/swagger.json').
member.remarks: May contain '{documentName}' placeholder to register multiple routes.

member.name: T:NSwag.AspNetCore.SwaggerUi3Settings
member.summary: The settings for UseSwaggerUi3.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.summary: Gets or sets the Swagger UI OAuth2 client settings.

member.name: P:NSwag.AspNetCore.SwaggerUi3Settings.ServerUrl
member.summary: Gets or sets the server URL.

member.name: P:NSwag.AspNetCore.SwaggerUi3Settings.EnableTryItOut
member.summary: Specifies whether the "Try it out" option is enabled in Swagger UI 3.

member.name: P:NSwag.AspNetCore.SwaggerUi3Settings.DocumentTitle
member.summary: Gets or sets a title for the Swagger UI page.

member.name: P:NSwag.AspNetCore.SwaggerUi3Settings.CustomHeadContent
member.summary: Gets or sets additional content to place in the head of the Swagger UI page.

member.name: P:NSwag.AspNetCore.SwaggerUi3Settings.ValidateSpecification
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the Swagger specification should be validated.

member.name: P:NSwag.AspNetCore.SwaggerUi3Settings.AdditionalSettings
member.summary: Gets the additional Swagger UI 3 settings.

member.name: P:NSwag.AspNetCore.SwaggerUi3Settings.DocExpansion
member.summary: Controls how the API listing is displayed. It can be set to 'none' (default), 'list' (shows operations for each resource), or 'full' (fully expanded: shows operations and their details).

member.name: P:NSwag.AspNetCore.SwaggerUi3Settings.OperationsSorter
member.summary: Specifies the operations sorter in Swagger UI 3.

member.name: P:NSwag.AspNetCore.SwaggerUi3Settings.DefaultModelsExpandDepth
member.summary: The default expansion depth for models (set to -1 completely hide the models) in Swagger UI 3.

member.name: P:NSwag.AspNetCore.SwaggerUi3Settings.DefaultModelExpandDepth
member.summary: The default expansion depth for the model on the model-example section in Swagger UI 3.

member.name: P:NSwag.AspNetCore.SwaggerUi3Settings.TagsSorter
member.summary: Specifies the tags sorter in Swagger UI 3

member.name: P:NSwag.AspNetCore.SwaggerUi3Settings.WithCredentials
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether to send credentials from the Swagger UI 3 to the backend.

member.name: P:NSwag.AspNetCore.SwaggerUi3Settings.SwaggerRoutes
member.summary: Gets or sets the Swagger URL routes (must start with '/', hides SwaggerRoute).

member.name: T:NSwag.AspNetCore.SwaggerUi3Route
member.summary: Specifies a route in the Swagger dropdown.

member.name: M:NSwag.AspNetCore.SwaggerUi3Route.#ctor(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: P:NSwag.AspNetCore.SwaggerUi3Route.Url
member.summary: Gets the route URL.

member.name: P:NSwag.AspNetCore.SwaggerUi3Route.Name
member.summary: Gets the route name.

member.name: T:NSwag.AspNetCore.SwaggerUiSettings
member.summary: The settings for UseSwaggerUi.

member.name: P:NSwag.AspNetCore.SwaggerUiSettings.ValidateSpecification
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the Swagger specification should be validated.

member.name: P:NSwag.AspNetCore.SwaggerUiSettings.OAuth2Client
member.summary: Gets or sets the Swagger UI OAuth2 client settings.

member.name: P:NSwag.AspNetCore.SwaggerUiSettings.SupportedSubmitMethods
member.summary: Gets or sets the Swagger UI supported submit methods. An array of of the HTTP operations that will have the 'Try it out!' option.

member.name: P:NSwag.AspNetCore.SwaggerUiSettings.DocExpansion
member.summary: Controls how the API listing is displayed. It can be set to 'none' (default), 'list' (shows operations for each resource), or 'full' (fully expanded: shows operations and their details).

member.name: P:NSwag.AspNetCore.SwaggerUiSettings.UseJsonEditor
member.summary: Enables a graphical view for editing complex bodies. Defaults to false.

member.name: P:NSwag.AspNetCore.SwaggerUiSettings.DefaultModelRendering
member.summary: Controls how models are shown when the API is first rendered. (The user can always switch the rendering for a given model by clicking the 'Model' and 'Model Schema' links.) It can be set to 'model' or 'schema', and the default is 'schema'.

member.name: P:NSwag.AspNetCore.SwaggerUiSettings.ShowRequestHeaders
member.summary: Whether or not to show the headers that were sent when making a request via the 'Try it out!' option. Defaults to false.

member.name: T:NSwag.AspNetCore.SwaggerUiSettingsBase
member.summary: The base settings for all Swagger UIs.

member.name: M:NSwag.AspNetCore.SwaggerUiSettingsBase.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: P:NSwag.AspNetCore.SwaggerUiSettingsBase.Path
member.summary: Gets or sets the internal swagger UI route (must start with '/').

member.name: P:NSwag.AspNetCore.SwaggerUiSettingsBase.CustomInlineStyles
member.summary: Gets or sets custom inline styling to inject into the index.html

member.name: P:NSwag.AspNetCore.SwaggerUiSettingsBase.CustomStylesheetPath
member.summary: Gets or sets a URI to load a custom CSS Stylesheet into the index.html

member.name: P:NSwag.AspNetCore.SwaggerUiSettingsBase.CustomJavaScriptPath
member.summary: Gets or sets a URI to load a custom JavaScript file into the index.html.

member.name: P:NSwag.AspNetCore.SwaggerUiSettingsBase.TransformToExternalPath
member.summary: Gets or sets the external route base path (must start with '/', default: null = use SwaggerUiRoute).

member.name: M:NSwag.AspNetCore.SwaggerUiSettingsBase.GetCustomStyleHtml(Microsoft.AspNetCore.Http.HttpRequest)
member.summary: Gets an HTML snippet for including custom StyleSheet in swagger UI.

member.name: M:NSwag.AspNetCore.SwaggerUiSettingsBase.GetCustomScriptHtml(Microsoft.AspNetCore.Http.HttpRequest)
member.summary: Gets an HTML snippet for including custom JavaScript in swagger UI.

member.summary: Generates the additional objects JavaScript code.

member.name: T:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Builder.NSwagApplicationBuilderExtensions
member.summary: NSwag extensions for .

member.name: M:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Builder.NSwagApplicationBuilderExtensions.UseOpenApi(Microsoft.AspNetCore.Builder.IApplicationBuilder,System.Action{NSwag.AspNetCore.OpenApiDocumentMiddlewareSettings})
member.summary: Adds the OpenAPI/Swagger generator that uses the ASP.NET Core API Explorer (default route defined in document: /swagger/v1/swagger.json).
member.remarks: Registers multiple routes/documents if the settings.Path contains a '{documentName}' placeholder. The methods and are the same, but will be deprecated eventually.

member.name: M:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Builder.NSwagApplicationBuilderExtensions.UseSwagger(Microsoft.AspNetCore.Builder.IApplicationBuilder,System.Action{NSwag.AspNetCore.OpenApiDocumentMiddlewareSettings})
member.summary: Adds the OpenAPI/Swagger generator that uses the ASP.NET Core API Explorer (default route defined in document: /swagger/v1/swagger.json).
member.remarks: Registers multiple routes/documents if the settings.Path contains a '{documentName}' placeholder. The methods and are the same, but will be deprecated eventually.

member.name: M:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Builder.NSwagApplicationBuilderExtensions.UseSwaggerUi3(Microsoft.AspNetCore.Builder.IApplicationBuilder,System.Action{NSwag.AspNetCore.SwaggerUi3Settings})
member.summary: Adds the Swagger UI (UI only) to the pipeline (default route: /swagger).
member.remarks: The settings.GeneratorSettings property does not have any effect.

member.name: M:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Builder.NSwagApplicationBuilderExtensions.UseReDoc(Microsoft.AspNetCore.Builder.IApplicationBuilder,System.Action{NSwag.AspNetCore.ReDocSettings})
member.summary: Adds the ReDoc UI (UI only) to the pipeline (default route: /swagger).
member.remarks: The settings.GeneratorSettings property does not have any effect.

member.name: M:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Builder.NSwagApplicationBuilderExtensions.UseSwaggerUi(Microsoft.AspNetCore.Builder.IApplicationBuilder,System.Action{NSwag.AspNetCore.SwaggerUiSettings})
member.summary: Adds the Swagger UI (only) to the pipeline.

member.name: M:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Builder.NSwagApplicationBuilderExtensions.UseApimundo(Microsoft.AspNetCore.Builder.IApplicationBuilder,System.Action{NSwag.AspNetCore.ApimundoUiSettings})
member.summary: Adds a redirect to the Apimundo.com user interface to the pipeline (default route: /apimundo).
member.remarks: The settings.GeneratorSettings property does not have any effect.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Extensions.DependencyInjection.NSwagSwaggerGeneratorSettingsExtensions
member.summary: Extensions for the .

member.name: M:Microsoft.Extensions.DependencyInjection.NSwagSwaggerGeneratorSettingsExtensions.AddSecurity(NSwag.Generation.OpenApiDocumentGeneratorSettings,System.String,NSwag.OpenApiSecurityScheme)
member.summary: Appends the OAuth2 security scheme and requirement to the document's security definitions.
member.remarks: Adds a document processor with the given arguments.
member.param: The name/key of the security scheme/definition.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Extensions.DependencyInjection.NSwagSwaggerGeneratorSettingsExtensions.AddSecurity(NSwag.Generation.OpenApiDocumentGeneratorSettings,System.String,System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{System.String},NSwag.OpenApiSecurityScheme)
member.summary: Appends the OAuth2 security scheme and requirement to the document's security definitions.
member.remarks: Adds a document processor with the given arguments.
member.param: The name/key of the security scheme/definition.
The global scope names to add to as security requirement with the scheme name in the document's 'security' property (can be an empty list).
